articles.title: AT&T Refines Subscriber Experience With New Service Guarantee And More
articles.author: Will Townsend
articles.summary: AT&T launched the 'AT&T Guarantee,' a customer-first promise across its wireless and fiber networks, which aims to improve customer experience. Furthermore, AT&T introduced 'AT&T Turbo', offering customers a data performance boost for applications like gaming and streaming. AT&T is also leveraging generative AI to reduce customer callback times and improve field service technician productivity.

articles.title: Google's 'Ask for Me' feature calls businesses on your behalf to inquire about services, pricing
articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.summary: Google is testing a new AI-powered service called "Ask for Me" that calls local businesses to inquire about availability and pricing for services like oil changes or manicures. Users enrolled in Search Labs can access this feature via Google Search. Google's AI will then make calls to local businesses on your behalf and send you a summary of prices and availability.

articles.title: Google's New Ask for Me Feature Saves Time By Using AI to Call Local Businesses
articles.author: Brent Dirks
articles.summary: Google is testing a new AI feature called "Ask for Me" that helps users find pricing and availability information from local businesses like auto shops and nail salons. Users specify their needs, and Google uses AI to call businesses and provide a summary of prices and availability via text message. This service is currently available in the United States through Google Search Labs.

articles.title: Ziggi's testing lineup of â€˜dirty sodas'
articles.author: Bizwest Staff
articles.summary: Ziggi's Coffee has launched a trial of its new 'dirty soda' menu at its Mead location, featuring a fusion of soda and creative flavors. The company plans to expand the offering to 13 pilot locations in February and nationwide later this year, with prices ranging from $2.69 to $4.69. The 'dirty soda' menu includes flavors such as 'Sunset Blvd.,' 'Bruce' and 'Cherry Bomb.'

articles.title: Gems launches Astra Nova, Raising $1M+ on First Day of Token Presale
articles.author: Isabella
articles.summary: Astra Nova, an AI-driven gaming ecosystem, has launched its Revive token ($RVV) pre-sale on Gems Launchpad, raising over $1 million in the first 24 hours. Furthermore, Astra Nova plans to launch an AI-powered webcomics decentralized app (dApp) and debut its Survival Mode RPG on the Shibarium blockchain.

articles.title: Recommendations for HP Rp1 millions that are qualified for everyday
articles.author: leading tech analyst
articles.summary: Tecno has launched the Spark 30C smartphone, emphasizing its extended battery life and seamless performance. The Spark 30C features a 6.67-inch LCD display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 5,000mAh battery with optimized power management, and a 50MP main camera. The device is powered by the MediaTek Helio G81 chipset and offers 6GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage.

articles.title: Every Man Jack has gone below the belt: Shop anti-chafe gel, deodorant lotion and more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Every Man Jack has launched the 'Below the Belt' line, a new collection of personal care products for men, including deodorant lotion, foaming cleanser, and anti-chafe gel. These products are designed with specific applicators for easy use and are available at Amazon and Walmart for under $12 each.

articles.title: Every Man Jack has gone below the belt: Shop anti-chafe gel, deodorant lotion and more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Every Man Jack has launched its new 'Below the Belt' personal care line, designed for men's intimate areas. The line includes deodorant lotion, foaming cleanser, and anti-chafe gel, all priced under $12. The products are available at Amazon and Walmart and feature unique applicators for ease of use.

articles.title: Every Man Jack has gone below the belt: Shop anti-chafe gel, deodorant lotion and more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Every Man Jack launched a new "Below the Belt" line of men's personal care products, including deodorant lotion, foaming cleanser, and anti-chafe gel. These products are designed for sensitive areas and are available at Amazon and Walmart for under $12. Each product features a unique applicator for easy use.

articles.title: Every Man Jack has gone below the belt: Shop anti-chafe gel, deodorant lotion and more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Every Man Jack launched a new affordable line of men's personal care products for sensitive areas, priced under $12. The line consists of three products: anti-chafe gel, deodorant lotion, and foaming cleanser, each featuring helpful applicators for easy and precise use. These products are available at Every Man Jack, Walmart, and Amazon.

articles.title: Every Man Jack has gone below the belt: Shop anti-chafe gel, deodorant lotion and more
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Every Man Jack has launched a new personal care line called 'Below the Belt,' designed for intimate areas. The line includes deodorant lotion, foaming cleanser, and anti-chafe gel, all priced under $12. The products are available at Amazon and Walmart, featuring applicators for easy use.

articles.title: Franzy: Funding Raised To Streaming Business Buying Processes
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Franzy launched its AI-powered platform after raising $1 million in pre-seed funding. The platform aims to streamline the franchising process, offering aspiring entrepreneurs a user-friendly and transparent way to explore and invest in franchising opportunities. Franzy uses AI to match users with franchises based on their interests, investment level, and location.

articles.title: Are Samsung Galaxy and iPhone AI features useful?
articles.author: Randi Mann
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Galaxy S25 series, featuring the Galaxy S25 Ultra, which was unveiled at Galaxy Unpacked and showcases the latest iteration of Galaxy AI, including features like Photo Editor with 'Best Face' mode and Generative Edit. Apple's iPhone 16 Pro also boasts AI capabilities, known as Apple Intelligence, enhancing features like Siri with more organic conversations and improved app interaction.

articles.title: Is the Laundry Chute Ready for a Comeback?
articles.author: Jillian Pretzel
articles.summary: Property People notes that some homeowners have shown an interest in vacuum-powered chutes, which transport clothing to any room via vacuum. These chutes are gaining popularity as an efficient and flexible laundry solution. Anubis Properties calls them "more gimmick than game changer" due to being noisy and energy-hungry.

articles.title: Startups to Watch
articles.author: Liz Engel
articles.summary: Several companies have recently launched or introduced new products and services. Nedl launched its AI platform for real estate predictions in August 2024. Hackerverse released its AI-powered cybersecurity software proof-of-concept platform and aims to expand to other software verticals. Rescue Ventilation Solutions is developing Spiritus, a device providing real-time CPR feedback, with a prototype expected this spring and SMB, a marketplace for small businesses, launched and is developing their platform using a "Zillow for small business" approach.

articles.title: 5 promising Galaxy AI features on Samsung's latest S25 flagships
articles.author: Stephen Radochia
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 series phones with integrated Galaxy AI. The Galaxy AI enhances photo and video editing tools, allowing users to remove unwanted objects and improve audio quality. The series includes the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, each with varying screen sizes, storage options, and features, all powered by Galaxy AI.

articles.title: Google's â€˜Ask for Me' uses AI to call local businesses for you
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Google is testing 'Ask for Me,' a new AI tool that calls nail salons and auto shops to gather information about pricing and availability. Built using Duplex, this feature allows users to submit requests through Google Search, and the AI then makes calls to businesses to collect the necessary details. Businesses can opt out of receiving these automated calls.

articles.title: Google's â€˜Ask for Me' uses AI to call local businesses for you
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Google is testing a new AI-powered tool called 'Ask for Me' that automates calls to nail salons and auto shops to collect information about pricing and availability. The feature, built using Duplex, allows users to find the best service based on their needs. Businesses can opt out of receiving these automated calls through their Google Business Profile settings.

articles.title: Ditch the trickle for this 'luxurious' 90-nozzle rain shower head, on sale for $20
articles.author: Britt Ross
articles.summary: SparkPod has launched the Rain Shower Head, now available on Amazon for a record-low price of $20. The shower head features 90 mini-nozzles for a waterfall-like experience and is designed for easy installation with a maximum outflow of 1.8 gallons per minute.

articles.title: Google's 'Ask for me' AI calls businesses so that you don't have to
articles.author: Karandeep Singh Oberoi
articles.summary: Google is launching a new Search Labs experiment called 'Ask for me,' an AI-powered tool that calls local businesses to inquire about service pricing and availability on behalf of users. Initially limited to nail salons and auto repair shops in the US, users can trigger the feature through specific searches and provide details about their needs. The tool provides a summary of the gathered information within approximately thirty minutes.

articles.title: Google Adds New Options for Demand Gen Campaigns
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google is introducing several updates to its Demand Gen campaigns. These include product feeds for ads, enabling direct product detail access, local offers displaying availability, expanded channel controls for ad placement, vertical image ads on YouTube Shorts, and new reporting columns in Google Ads for performance insights.

articles.title: 'I visited British bomb factory - the ballistics line isn't what you'd expect'
articles.author: Layla Nicholson
articles.summary: Lush's co-founder, Mo Constantine, created the 'Aqua Sizzler' bath bomb. The article references new product 'Lush Atom Heart Mother Bath Bomb', where the staff showed how to make it. Also, it describes the making process of 'Rosy Cheeks' face mask.

articles.title: I picked four 'versatile' New Look dresses for Â£12 in the sale
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: New Look has launched a sale featuring discounted dresses. The sale includes a variety of dresses such as a Polka Dot Mini Smock Dress, a Brown Leopard Print Long Sleeve Mini Dress, a Black Funnel Neck Crinkle Textured Mini Dress, and a Brown Crew Neck Bodycon Midi Dress, all priced at Â£12 each.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works now open in Spring
articles.author: Carson Weaver
org: Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works opened a new 4,067-square-foot store in Cypresswood Court shopping center in Spring. The store provides fragrances, candles, diffusers, room sprays, hand soaps and sanitizers.

articles.title: New Coca-Cola flavor roasted by soda lovers: â€˜The stuff of nightmares'
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching a new flavor, Coca-Cola Orange Cream, in the US and Canada on February 10th. This new beverage combines the classic Coca-Cola formula with refreshing orange and smooth creamy vanilla flavors and will also be available in a Zero Sugar version. The company is supporting the launch with an ad campaign, despite some mixed initial consumer reactions.

articles.title: Wading into the unknown: Important generative AI policy considerations
articles.author: Seacoast Online
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT on November 30, 2022. This launch and subsequent generative AI model releases have significantly impacted the business landscape.

articles.title: Robb Recommends: The Advanced Serum Duo Designed to Make Your Hands Look Younger
articles.author: Justin Fenner
articles.summary: Orveda, a French biotech skincare company, has introduced the Youth Glove Protocol, a new product designed to improve the appearance of hands. The protocol includes a mask, a hand cream, and silicone gloves, which aims to hydrate and protect the hands from environmental damage, while also targeting fine lines, wrinkles, and age spots.

articles.title: Bubble waffles, taiyaki on the menu at Mall of America's newest ice cream shop
articles.author: Christine Schuster
articles.summary: Mr. Waffle Dessert has reopened at the Mall of America, featuring its signature Hong Kong-style bubble waffles served with ice cream and toppings. The shop, currently in its soft opening phase, plans to introduce Taiyaki and soufflÃ© pancakes soon.

articles.title: Amazon will give you a $20 if you spend $80 on household essentials. Here's how to get it
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a promotion where customers who spend $27 on Tide Free & Gentle Detergent Pods or other P&G eligible products like Olay, Gillette, and Vicks personal care items can earn a promotional credit. The credit is automatically added to the customer's Amazon account after the order ships and must be redeemed by August 30th.

articles.title: Mobile pumps make industry more flexible
articles.author: CBN
articles.summary: Lutz Pumpen is launching the B70H eccentric screw pump and the B3 battery-powered drum pump. The B70 series pumps are suitable for watery to highly viscous liquids with up to 100 000 mPas, featuring a gentle, low-pulsation pumping action with flow rates up to 120 l/min.

articles.title: In pictures: Crowds gather for opening of NI's first Chick-fil-A
articles.author: Sophie McLaughlin
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A has launched its first restaurant in Northern Ireland, located at Applegreen's Lisburn South. The restaurant offers menu items including chicken sandwiches, lemonade, and hand-breaded nuggets and is open from 10am-10pm Monday to Saturday. A second location is due to open at Applegreen Templepatrick in March.

articles.title: Uniform Recognized as a Visionary in 2025 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for Digital Experience Platforms
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Uniform's composable digital experience platform was recognized as a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Digital Experience Platforms. Uniform's platform includes AI features designed to optimize user experiences and improve conversions. The company's composable-first approach enables incremental modernization and accelerates innovation for digital leaders.

articles.title: Lovehoney reveals secret weapon that will help you find the perfect gift this Valentine's Day
articles.author: Brijiena Lovelace
articles.summary: Lovehoney has introduced A.I.ssistant, an AI-powered tool designed to provide gift suggestions for Valentine's Day. The company offers product such as the Womanizer Liberty 2 (designed in collaboration with Iggy Azalea), Fleshlight X Lovehoney Masterstroke Male Masturbator, and We-Vibe X Lovehoney Sync Go couple's vibrator as part of their Valentine's Day offerings.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a 'compact' $200 handheld vacuum for just $25, and shoppers say it's 'very powerful'
articles.author: Victoria Garcia
articles.summary: Pentantan Store Cordless Handheld Vacuum, available at Walmart, is on sale for $25. This vacuum features 8000Pa suction, can clean wet messes, and comes with multiple attachments. The vacuum weighs 1.4 pounds, has a 500ml dust cup, and charges via USB.

articles.title: Supermarket imitations of brands are rife. Here's why
articles.author: Ged Futter
articles.summary: Retailers like Holland & Barrett and M&S have been accused of copying product ideas presented by smaller suppliers, with M&S launching chocolate matchsticks after an initial pitch. Aldi is also known for copying products, and major retailers often launch their own versions of successful products introduced by small manufacturers. This imitation practice highlights a shortcut to new product introductions in the competitive retail landscape.

articles.title: New Riverside food pantry lets clients do their own shopping
articles.author: Mark Acosta
articles.summary: Feeding America Riverside | San Bernardino launched the Fresh Start Pantry, a grocery store-like service designed to combat hunger. Goodman constructed the pantry.

articles.title: Wolt launches an innovative subscription program and upgraded app
articles.author: IN COLLABORATION WITH WOLT
articles.summary: Wolt has launched Wolt Plus, a monthly subscription service in Israel, offering unlimited deliveries for a fixed monthly fee of NIS 49. The service allows subscribers to order from various businesses, including restaurants, supermarkets, and clothing stores, without paying delivery fees. Wolt is also planning to introduce Wolt Value, an advanced search feature for product price comparisons, and a new delivery service called Wolt Package.

articles.title: New Balance Sneakers Are on Sale Now for $55 Off, and Shoppers Say They â€˜Absolutely Love These Shoes'
articles.author: Kelsey McCarson
articles.summary: New Balance is offering the Fresh Foam X 1080v13 running shoe, touted for its versatility and comfortable design, at Joe's New Balance Outlet for $110, a significant discount from the original retail price of $165. The shoes are available in multiple styles and a range of sizes, with reviewers praising their cushioning and support for various running activities.

articles.title: AI wars' impact on the future of business
articles.author: Reynaldo C. Lugtu
articles.summary: DeepSeek, a Chinese AI platform, has emerged as a competitor to established models like OpenAI's ChatGPT. It claims to have developed a competitive model at a fraction of the cost, potentially lowering the barrier for businesses to adopt advanced AI solutions. The competition between AI platforms like DeepSeek and ChatGPT has implications for the future of work, consumption, and innovation, as these tools transform industries and drive economic growth.

articles.title: Fresh BlendsÂ® Introduces Enhanced Fresh Blends Cloud Platform with AI-Driven Analytics
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Fresh Blends has introduced the enhanced Fresh Blends Cloud platform, which includes DataStudio and Dynamic Pivot powered by ProReports. This platform provides real-time data access and AI-driven analytics for beverage management and optimization. The Fresh Blends Cloud aims to offer data-driven menus and improve beverage programs for Fresh Blends customers.

articles.title: Amazon Fire Stick users fuming as popular TV feature is removed â€“ and threaten to switch to a rival
articles.author: Senior Technology
articles.summary: Amazon has removed the app hiding feature from its Fire Stick devices through a software update (Fire OS 8.1.2.7), impacting users who previously used the function to customize their profiles and restrict app access. This change affects both pre-installed Amazon apps and third-party platforms, as well as both older and current generation devices.

articles.title: Pre-order Samsung's new Galaxy S25 Ultra and get up to $1,250 in savings
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Samsung launched pre-orders for its new Galaxy S25 Ultra smartphone during the 2025 Samsung Unpacked event. The phone features a cutting-edge camera, long battery life, and AI integration and is available for pre-order with up to $1,250 in savings, including trade-in credits and Samsung credits. Estimated shipping times range from early February to early March.

articles.title: Pre-order Samsung's new Galaxy S25 Ultra and get up to $1,250 in savings
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new Galaxy S25 Ultra, featuring a sleek design, powerful processor, AI integration, and a cutting-edge camera. The phone is available for pre-order now, with estimated shipping times in early February to early March, and pre-order bonuses include discounts, trade-in credit, and Samsung Credits.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra review: Boring but brilliant
articles.author: Tech Advisor
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, featuring a refreshed design with curved corners, a new 50Mp ultrawide camera, and software enhancements powered by AI. The phone boasts a Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chip, an improved anti-reflective screen, and enhanced image processing, with pre-orders available and shipping starting February 1, 2025.

articles.title: Amazon Prime members have hours left to use popular perk before company axes â€˜convenient' benefit
articles.author: Maya Lanzone
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try eligible clothing, shoes, and accessories before purchasing. This decision stems from the program's limited scalability and the increasing adoption of Amazon's new AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations designed to improve the online shopping experience.

articles.title: Progresso Introduces First-Ever 'Soup Drops' For Cold and Flu Season
articles.author: William Bornhoft
articles.summary: Progresso is launching a new product called "Soup Drops," which are lozenges designed to deliver the classic flavor of Progresso Chicken Noodle Soup. The Soup Drops come in packaging that mirrors the iconic Progresso Soup can, containing 20 individually wrapped candies and each order includes a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup.

articles.title: Floyi Launches AI-Powered Content Strategy Platform to Help Brands Achieve Topical Authority
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Floyi, an AI-powered content strategy platform, has launched a new SaaS platform featuring AI-powered topical maps and topical research tools. The platform offers structured content plans that include brand identity definition, buyer persona creation, topical outline generation, keyword clustering, and topical map transformation. New users receive free credits to explore the platform's features.

articles.title: Zeno 10 Itel is scheduled to release 2025 in Indonesia, this is specifications and price!
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Itel is launching the Zeno 10 smartphone in early 2025, targeting Gen Z with its stylish design and affordable price. The phone features a dual-camera system, a 90Hz refresh rate display, and an adjustable notch similar to Apple's Dynamic Island. SEOWriting also boasts a powerful 'auto-posting' feature that allows users to schedule content for publication at specific times.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans scrambling to buy game-changing air fryer in middle aisle â€“ and it costs just â‚¬49.99
articles.author: Danielle Russell Masterson
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching a range of new kitchen products, including the Ambiano Air Fryer With Window, featuring a 4.8L capacity, 12 preset programs, and digital controls. Other Ambiano products being introduced are the Textured Kettle and Toaster (â‚¬14.99 each) and the Milk Frother (â‚¬24.99). Aldi is also launching Salter Megastone Pans (â‚¬19.99 each) and stainless-steel bottles (â‚¬7.99 each).

articles.title: MOBI Revolutionizes Dining with AI-driven Voice Intelligent Ordering
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: MOBI is offering a beta trial for its new AI-driven ordering service, VIO. MOBI, a hospitality technology company, provides solutions such as online ordering, branded storefronts, mobile apps, white-label delivery, and marketplace order aggregation.

articles.title: These 57 Products Will Make Your Cleaning And Organizing Fantasies Reality
articles.author: Natalie Brown
articles.summary: The article presents a curated list of new or noteworthy cleaning and organization products available on Amazon. These include items such as a honeycomb drawer insert, duster sponges, glass jars with bamboo lids, Bioclean hard water stain remover, citrus-scented foaming carpet shampoo, car vacuum, beauty organizer, reusable Swiffer mop pad, Dawn Powerwash, Rubbermaid Brilliance containers, storage lid organizer, Tineco cordless vacuum and mop, wall-mounted rack and broom organizer, bed bands, Chom Chom pet hair remover roller, and Rocco & Roxie's odor-eliminating spray. The collection spans storage solutions, cleaning agents, and tools, and organizational aids.

articles.title: Deepseek vs ChatGPT: Which is Better?
articles.author: Hillary Essien
articles.summary: DeepSeek launched its R1 model, an open-source AI, which is free to use. This new model offers comparable performance to ChatGPT in many tasks, particularly in technical areas like coding and complex math.  However, DeepSeek currently struggles with availability due to high demand, while ChatGPT offers a more readily available interface and features like image generation and voice interaction.

articles.title: Innovative Eyewear Announces Key Retail Partnership with Micro Center
articles.author: Innovative Eyewear
articles.summary: Innovative Eyewear, Inc. has partnered with Micro Center to expand its retail presence. Lucyd smart eyewear will be available in Micro Center stores across the United States and online. This partnership introduces Lucyd products to a wider consumer base through a leading tech retailer.

articles.title: AiAdvertising Launches TADA
articles.author: Aiadvertising
articles.summary: PSP, an AI-powered customer acquisition engine, introduces enhanced targeting and personalization to optimize campaign performance. It focuses on improving user engagement and conversion rates through advanced analytics and automation. PSP also offers integration with various platforms to streamline marketing efforts and enhance return on investment.

articles.title: What goes into designing that popular teapot or water bottle?
articles.author: Kim Cook
articles.summary: Scott Henderson, after brainstorming with ZVerse, created the ZShield, a face shield attached at the neck which became popular during COVID-19 and was produced in North Carolina. Whipsaw collaborated with Owala (part of Trove Brands) on the FreeSip water bottle, which was recognized by Time magazine and The New York Times. Whipsaw also worked with Life360 on refining the design for Tile tracker.

articles.title: What goes into designing that popular teapot or water bottle? 2 top creators discuss the process
articles.author: KIM COOK
articles.summary: Skip Hop launched the Moby spout cover designed by Scott Henderson. Henderson also collaborated with ZVerse to create the ZShield face shield. Whipsaw partnered with Owala (Trove Brands) on the FreeSip water bottle and Tonal on a smart home gym.

articles.title: With the Rollout of Millions of Integrated Smartphones, MiMedia Expands Its Commitment with AppLovin's AI Powered Solutions Platform
articles.author: Mi Media
articles.summary: MiMedia is expanding its commitment to AppLovin to optimize monetization of its advertising platform, which is embedded in millions of new smartphones. MiMedia is working with AppLovin to customize AI-powered solutions to optimize monetization for the mobile advertising inventory within the MiMedia cloud platform.

articles.title: Nigeria launches 'Service-Wise GPT' to enhance public service efficiency through AI
articles.author: Innovation Village
articles.summary: Nigeria has launched Service-Wise GPT, an AI-powered tool, to enhance the efficiency of public services. The tool facilitates streamlined access to government information and automates the drafting of policies. The unveiling occurred at the Global Government Summit.

articles.title: Flex Pricing Releases First Ever User Level Dynamic Pricing Software
articles.author: Flex Pricing LLC
articles.summary: Flex Pricing has announced the release of its user-level dynamic pricing software for e-commerce, enabling merchants to set pricing rules based on user attributes like income, device, and location. The software is currently available as a WooCommerce plugin, with a Shopify app planned for release by March 1st.

articles.title: TVS X performance e-scooter deliveries begin in India over a year after launch
articles.author: Sameer Fayaz Contractor
articles.summary: TVS commenced deliveries of its new premium electric scooter, the TVS X, in December 2024, starting in Bengaluru, after its initial launch in India in 2023. The TVS X boasts features like a 10.25-inch TFT display with Android Auto, a 4.4 kWh battery offering a 140 km range, and an 11 kW electric motor capable of reaching 105 kmph.

articles.title: Symphony Ltd Makes Waves in Water Heating with AI-Powered Geysers
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Symphony Ltd has launched three innovative geyser models in India, featuring PUROPOD Cartridge technology for water filtration. The Symphony Spa range is India's first AI-powered water heater using SmartBath technology. These water heaters are available on e-commerce, direct-to-consumer platforms, and select modern trade channels, supported by an advertising campaign addressing hard water-related hair fall.

articles.title: Honor sets new benchmark in SA with launch of â€˜unbreakable' X9c AI smartphone
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR X9c smartphone on January 29, introducing a new mid-range device with features like a durable design, long-lasting battery, and AI capabilities. The HONOR X9c will be available for purchase from February 7 with a retail price starting at R10,999.

articles.title: Snackster: A Flavorsome Revolution for the Modern Host
articles.summary: Sneha Chicken has launched Snackster, a new line of frozen party snacks. The product range includes items like chicken nuggets, seekh kebabs, chicken popcorn, and chicken samosas, initially available in Hyderabad and Bangalore with plans for expansion. Dulquer Salmaan is the face of Snackster's launch campaign, promoting the brand as a youthful and trendy choice.

articles.title: Yummilandâ„¢ Brings Back Num Nomsâ„¢ in New Body Scents for Kid-Friendly, Cosmetic Fun
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment is launching Yummiland Num Noms Body Scents, an expansion of the Yummiland doll collection. These scented characters function as mini perfume rollers with DIY sweet scents and are available at major retailers. The new product line is designed as an extension of the brand, following the popularity of Yummiland dolls since their VidCon launch.

articles.title: From Home Kitchen To ASEAN Market: Chef Ustazah Takes Her Next Big Step
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Chef Ustazah is planning to introduce her ready-to-eat products, including her garlic spread, which has recorded sales of over RM500,000 via TikTok, to the ASEAN market and globally. This move is supported by her participation in the IDEAS Malaysia entrepreneur programme, which provides guidance in digital marketing to expand market reach.

articles.title: Yummilandâ„¢ Brings Back Num Nomsâ„¢ in New Body Scents for Kid-Friendly, Cosmetic Fun
articles.author: MGA Entertainment
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment has launched Yummiland Num Noms Body Scents, a new DIY, scented collection of mini perfume rollers for kids. These surprise unboxing toys feature unique scents like birthday cake and passion fruit, allowing kids to create their own on-the-go perfumes. Yummiland Num Noms are now available at major retailers, including Target, Walmart, and Amazon.

articles.title: Nigeria launches AI-powered 'Service-Wise GPT' to transform public service
articles.author: Techpoint
articles.summary: Nigeria launched 'Service-Wise GPT,' an AI assistant. This AI tool is designed to streamline public service operations by enhancing efficiency, automating policy drafting, and improving governance.

articles.title: Understanding Canada's Loyalty Evolution in 2025: Insights on Travel, Value, and Engagement
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: iSeatz has released a new report titled "The Tipping Point: Inside Canada's Changing Loyalty Landscape", offering strategies for brands to improve engagement in the Canadian travel loyalty market. The report provides insights into customer preferences and the role of AI in loyalty programs, emphasizing the importance of personalized offers and user experience improvements.

articles.title: Council Post: How AI-Generated Voice Will Transform The Advertising Sector
articles.author: Matt Hocking
articles.summary: WellSaid Labs' AI voice technology is transforming advertising and marketing by enabling personalized campaigns, efficient content creation, and consistent brand voice development.  The technology allows brands to explore opportunities in podcasts, streaming platforms, and radio, while also enabling hyper-localized messaging and sonic identity creation.  Brands must prioritize transparency and compliance and partner with reputable AI providers to navigate ethical and legal challenges.

articles.title: Samsung replaced Bixby with Gemini, but no one seems to have noticed
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 series and One UI 7 introduce new AI features, including AI-generated Now Brief, AI-powered editing tools, and expanded Gemini features.  The S25's side button is reassigned to Google Gemini, replacing Bixby, indicating a strategic shift towards more integrated and accessible AI functionality on Samsung devices.

articles.title: Picjam.ai â€“ Turning DIY Product Photos Into Studio-Quality Images
articles.summary: Picjam.ai, an AI-powered platform, is introduced to transform product photography for e-commerce brands by generating professional, studio-quality images from basic photos. The platform offers features like a fashion generator, background removal, and 'Fit to Model' functionality, along with SEO keyword suggestions to enhance product visibility and sales. Picjam.ai provides flexible pricing plans, including free, Pro, Studio, and Concierge options, catering to various business sizes.

articles.title: A robot vacuum with legs?! This new release has become the world's first to offer â€˜a truly hands-free' approach to cleaning â€” and I'm already impressed
articles.summary: Dreame Technology has launched the Dreame X50 Ultra Complete Robot Vacuum, which boasts retractable legs, advanced navigation, and both vacuuming and mopping capabilities. Available for pre-order and purchase starting February 7th, this innovative robot vacuum aims to revolutionize home cleaning with features like step navigation and object recognition. Sean Chen, Managing Director of Dreame WEU, highlights the company's commitment to simplifying home and garden care with this product and other innovative releases.

articles.title: The Oodie launches official Manchester City themed collection for football fans
articles.author: Brijiena Lovelace
articles.summary: The Oodie has launched a new range of officially licensed Manchester City-themed products, including Oodies for adults and kids, an outdoor jacket, and a blanket. Prices start at Â£49, and a limited-edition Manchester City cushion case is offered as a bonus with purchases while stocks last. This launch is the first of many collaborations with top Premier League clubs planned for this year.

articles.title: GeForce RTX 5080: New Architecture, but performance like Refresh (+9 %)
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched the GeForce RTX 5080, a mid-range graphics card built on the Blackwell architecture. It offers a performance boost over the RTX 4080 Super, outperforming the RTX 3070 but falling short of the RTX 3090, while facing competition from AMD's Radeon RX 7900 XTX. The RTX 5080 also has increased noise levels due to its new reference cooler.

articles.title: People are only just realising what the circle and dot symbol means on their laundry labels â€“ so can you figure it out?
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: AO.com's appliance expert, Gwilym Snook, explains that heat pump tumble dryers are energy-efficient appliances that recycle warm air to dry clothes at a cheaper rate than older models. Running the tumble dryer during off-peak electricity hours, between 10pm and 8am, can further reduce the cost of one cycle.

articles.title: Suzuki Motor to Launch 5-Door Jimny in Japan April 3
articles.summary: Suzuki Motor Corp. will release the Jimny Nomade, the first five-door model in its Jimny four-wheel-drive vehicle series in Japan, on April 3. The new Jimny Nomade has enhanced driving ability and extra comfort. The Jimny Nomade, with an engine displacement of 1,500 cc, has a longer body than the existing three-door model Sierra, providing ample luggage space.

articles.title: This shampoo and conditioner start at Â£5 a bottle - here's why they're my favourite
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: Monday Haircare, founded by Jaimee Lupton, launched in New Zealand and later expanded to over 40 countries. The brand offers seven different shampoo and conditioner ranges targeted toward different haircare needs such as moisture, clarify, smooth, volume, repair, colour protect and gentle. One of the popular range is moisture range which helps with knots and tangles.

articles.title: Nigeria unveils Service-Wise GPT to transform public service with AI
articles.author: Nairametrics
articles.summary: Nigeria has introduced Service-Wise GPT, an AI tool. This tool is designed to improve efficiency in the delivery of public services.

articles.title: Housing.com enhances tech portfolio with improved 3D, AR, and VR tools
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Housing.com launched its next-generation 3D, augmented reality (AR), and virtual reality (VR) tools, enhancing its real estate app offerings. The new tools includes DigiAR, Digitour, DigiPlot, Digislate, Digiport, Droneview, and Floorplan 3D, providing immersive and automated property exploration experiences. These tools are designed to enable informed decision-making and reduce time and costs.

articles.title: Is the Honor X9c a truly unbreakable AI smartphone?
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: Honor launched the Honor X9c, an 'unbreakable AI smartphone,' with a focus on durability and AI features like 'fake detect' and AI-powered photography. The company also unveiled the Honor X7c smartphone and teased the imminent arrival of the Honor Magic Book X14 laptop in South Africa.

articles.title: Zycus Launches Groundbreaking Merlin AI Platform
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Zycus is launching its Merlin Agentic AI Platform on February 11, 2025, introducing AI agents to streamline procurement processes. The platform aims to automate routine tasks, reduce cycle times by up to 50%, and uncover savings opportunities. Early trials show a potential 25% increase in supplier collaboration efficiency.

articles.title: Alibaba's Qwen: Everything you need to know about the new DeepSeek rival
articles.author: Arabian Business
articles.summary: Alibaba launched Qwen 2.5, a new version of its AI model, on Wednesday. The launch represents an update to the company's AI capabilities.

articles.title: Here's how to buy this top-spec Samsung vacuum for half price - if you're quick
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a limited-time deal on its Jet 95 Pro cordless stick cleaner, which is designed to be light in weight and heavy in power. The Jet 95 Pro uses jet turbines to propel the suction power and can run for an hour on a full charge. It includes interchangeable heads, a Z-station, LED lights, an LCD display, and an extendable pipe.

articles.title: Here's how to buy this top-spec Samsung vacuum for half price - if you're quick
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Samsung Jet 95 Pro cordless stick vacuum, a top-of-the-range appliance, is currently on a limited-time deal on Amazon with a 46% discount, bringing the price down to Â£348. The vacuum features powerful suction, long battery life, interchangeable heads, a Z-station for easy charging, and washable components.

articles.title: Stan announces exciting new Original series The Hack starring David Tennant, Robert Carlyle and Toby Jones
articles.author: Daily Mail
articles.summary: Streaming service Stan announced the launch of its new Original series called 'The Hack'.

articles.title: Cleaning is effortless with Hoover's Cordless Vacuum Cleaner (and save Â£90)
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Hoover has launched the Cordless Vacuum Cleaner with Anti Hair Wrap, featuring anti-hair wrap technology. It is on sale with a significant discount using code HF4-METRO, dropping the price from Â£299 to Â£139. The vacuum functions as both a traditional vacuum and a power mop, offering versatile cleaning solutions.

articles.title: TCL announces the P10 phone with an ink display
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: TCL has launched the P10 smartphone, featuring a new inkjet-based display. This technology promises improved color accuracy, energy efficiency, and a unique visual experience compared to traditional LCD and OLED screens.  The P10 also boasts a 6.78-inch Full HD+ display with NXTPAPER technology designed to reduce blue light emissions and minimize eye strain.

articles.title: Dyson is back with a powerful new vacuum that cleans more than just your home
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the Dyson Car+Boat, a powerful handheld vacuum cleaner, on February 4th for Â£249.99. The device features a motor spinning at 110,000 rpm, a filtration system capturing 99.99% of particles, and a 50-minute runtime, designed for cleaning cars, boats, and homes.

articles.title: Kingdom Centre screen: an icon of outdoor advertising
articles.author: Arab News
articles.summary: Rotana Signs launched a state-of-the-art advertising screen at the Kingdom Centre in Riyadh. This new advertising platform aims to provide an unparalleled advertising experience and establish Saudi Arabia as a hub for media and advertising, offering an innovative way for advertisers to connect with their target markets.

articles.title: If You Love The Feeling Of Sitting In A Clean, Organized Home, Start Off 2025 With These 52 Things
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article highlights a variety of cleaning and organizing products available for purchase on Amazon. These products include items such as sink cleaner, hard water stain remover, dish soap spray, car carpet cleaner and etc. The products aim to help individuals maintain cleanliness and organization in their homes, cars, and personal spaces.

articles.title: Cordless vacuum that 'keeps charge for ages' is 'perfect for quick pick-ups'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 46% discount on the Powools Handheld Vacuum Cordless, now priced at Â£27.07.  The lightweight vacuum features a powerful motor, three attachments, and an LED light.  Alternative handheld vacuums are available from Shark and Vax at different price points.

articles.title: How to sell on Amazon in South Africa: A step-by-step guide
articles.author: Ruth Gitonga
articles.summary: In May 2024, Amazon launched its platform for South African sellers, offering a R1 monthly selling fee. Amazon provides two selling plans: Individual (R10 per item) and Professional (R400 monthly), catering to different business needs. The guide outlines the registration process, product listing requirements (including GTIN, title, description, and images), and delivery options (Fulfilment by Amazon and Merchant-fulfilled network) for sellers looking to utilize Amazon South Africa.

articles.title: Bosch Unlimited 7 Aqua review: Saving time and effort on household cleaning
articles.author: Ciara O'Brien
articles.summary: Bosch introduced the Unlimited 7 Aqua, a two-in-one cordless vacuum and mop. The device features a twin-in-one mop head for simultaneous vacuuming and mopping, a dynamic power brush with LED lights, and HEPA filtration. It has a 3aH battery that gives about 40 minutes of run time.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Galaxy S25 Series Smartphone
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25. These new smartphones are presented as AI companions, offering natural and context-aware mobile experiences.

articles.title: Kia Syros: The SUV Wave In India Just Got A New Contender, The Overdrive Verdict
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Kia is introducing the Syros SUV as a new contender in the Indian automotive market. The SUV aims to capitalize on the increasing demand for SUVs in India.

articles.title: â€˜Must be joking': New Coca-Cola flavour roasted by fizzy drink fans
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching a new product, Coca-Cola Orange Cream, in the US and Canada on February 10. The new beverage blends the classic Coca-Cola formula with orange and creamy vanilla flavors and will also be available in a Zero Sugar version. This launch comes after the discontinuation of Coca-Cola Spiced.

articles.title: Make Your Home Feel More Grown-Up With These 31 Products
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Fullstar, a small business established in 2017 specializing in kitchen gadgets, offers a veggie chopper available on Amazon.  The article also mentions Quick and Clean, a small business, making K-cup cleaning pods.

articles.title: The great digital experience race: Are users abandoning your app?
articles.summary: Companies such as Swiggy, Uber, Zerodha, PhonePe, and Zomato are constantly evolving their digital experiences. Swiggy introduces seamless payment options and real-time tracking. PhonePe makes money transfers feel effortless, impacting user expectations and setting new standards for digital interactions and potentially launching new or updated features to meet these expectations.

articles.title: 'Game-changer' mattress shoppers say 'transformed their sleep' Â£112 off
articles.author: What's On Writer
articles.summary: Simba is offering discounts on its Hybrid Essential Mattress and Performance Mattress Protector. Dusk has a sale on its Memory Foam 2,000 Pocket Sprung Hybrid Mattress. Emma is selling its Hybrid Premium Mattress.

articles.title: Honor unveils flagship X9c
articles.author: MTHULISI SIBANDA
articles.summary: Honor launched the X9c and X7c smartphones in South Africa. The X9c, the flagship device in the X series, features an Anti-Drop Display, a 6600mAh silicon-carbon battery, and a 108MP ultra-sensing camera. Honor partnered with DJ Maphorisa for a TikTok challenge to promote the X9c launch.

articles.title: The new Google device will change the common Chromebook display
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google is launching the Chromebox OPS, which transforms any ordinary screen into a Chromebook by plugging it into an OPS slot. Leading display brands like LG, Viewonic, and Smart, will offer displays with this new technology. Google is also planning various new devices for Chromebooks with zdokonalenÃ½ displays and also adding new applications Figjam, Education Perfect and Discovery Education to Google Classroom.

articles.title: Louise McSharry: Hair mousse is better than ever and will make your Dyson volume and curls last
articles.author: Louise McSharry
articles.summary: Colour Wow launched Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer and TresemmÃ© introduced Volume & Lift Hair Mousse. BouclÃ¨me launched Super Volumising Foam and Umberto Giannini introduced Curl Whip Curl Activating Mousse. Vogue Williams' Bare by Vogue launched Face Tanning Mist, Sculpted by Aimee launched Second Skin Matte Foundation and Anastasia Beverly Hills launched Impeccable Blurring Second Skin Foundation.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 best Samsung model
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung's president, TM Roh, announced the upcoming Galaxy S25, emphasizing its slim design, durable build, customized processor, AI-enhanced camera capabilities, and battery performance. The Galaxy S25 will also feature Google Gemini Live, initially supporting Korean, English, and Hindi.

articles.title: Forget DeepSeek. Zuckerberg says Meta will spend hundreds of billions on AI.
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Meta's CEO claims the company's consumer AI offering will be a transformative product. This indicates the upcoming release or introduction of a new AI-powered product or service from Meta.

articles.title: BYD's luxury Range Rover rival still some way off from Australian launch
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: BYD plans to launch its premium Denza brand in Australia during 2025, introducing models like the Z9 sedan, Z9 GT shooting brake, N7 crossover, and D9 people mover. The company is also considering exporting the Fangchengbao Bao 5 to Australia as the Denza B5. BYD is testing vehicles in Australia to ensure they are suitable for local conditions.

articles.title: NordVPN Will Soon Let You Block the VPN Blockers
articles.summary: NordVPN is launching NordWhisper, a new protocol designed to bypass website blocks by mimicking regular web traffic. Initially available for Windows, Android, and Linux, it will later be released for macOS and iOS. NordWhisper will be an addition to the NordLynx, OpenVPN (UDP), and OpenVPN (TCP) protocols and maintains the same encryption.

articles.title: Google Expands Performance Max Features For Advertisers' Control
articles.author: Abolaji Adebayo
articles.summary: Google is introducing new features for its Performance Max campaigns, offering advertisers greater control and transparency. These include enhanced campaign controls with search query exclusions, a new customer acquisition goal with high-value mode, brand exclusions for different formats, and 'URL Contains' rules. Furthermore, upcoming features include demographic exclusions, device targeting, a search themes usefulness indicator, a search terms insights source column, and segmentation and download capabilities for asset group performance data.

articles.title: BYD's luxury Range Rover rival still some way off from Australian launch
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: BYD is planning to launch its premium Denza brand in Australia during 2025. The company is also testing Yangwang U8 vehicles in Australia to ensure suitability for local conditions before a potential future launch. Overseas reports suggest Yangwang will begin right-hand drive sales of the U8 in other markets this year.

articles.title: Council Post: If You're Not Using AI In Marketing, You're Already Behind
articles.summary: The Evoke Agency utilizes AI-powered tools such as ChatGPT, Adobe Firefly, and CapCut to enhance marketing services for beauty brands. The agency integrates AI technologies into its workflow to improve content creation, audience segmentation, and campaign optimization. These integrations helps to improve marketing strategies and help stay ahead.

articles.title: Chainlink introduces new data product for DeFi
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Chainlink launched a new product. This product targets the decentralized finance (DeFi) market.

articles.title: Aldi to charge shoppers Â£10 in new self-checkout move with AI-powered cameras
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a checkout-free innovation, competing with services offered by Amazon Fresh and Tesco. This positions Aldi among companies providing cashier-less shopping experiences.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 review: Refinement over reinvention!
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: OnePlus 13 has been tested during January to assess if it features dramatic changes or refinements. The review focuses on determining if it delivers the ultimate flagship experience.

articles.title: 54 launches new tech events arm
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: 54 has launched 'Behind The Volt', a new tech-focused infrastructure.

articles.title: Kia Syros: The SUV Wave In India Just Got A New Contender, The Overdrive Verdict ...
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: KIA debuts its new SUV, the Syros, in India. The company hopes the vehicle's bold, boxy design will disrupt the market.

articles.title: Startups to Watch 2025: Startup creates product to stop flood damage to walls
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: A local entrepreneur created StepStuds. StepStuds help prevent flood damage to walls.

articles.title: Maingear Now Offers Gaming Rigs With Nvidia RTX 5080 And 5090 GPUs
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nvidia launched its newest graphics cards. Maingear is now including Nvidia's new graphics cards in its upcoming builds.

articles.title: Donald Trump could have a big say in Nintendo Switch 2's price and success; here's ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Nintendo revealed its most-awaited product, Switch 2. Many details about Switch 2 are yet to be known.

articles.title: Adidas dropped its wild new Leopard Samba OG sneakers and they're already selling out
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Adidas launched its Leopard Pack Samba OG Sneakers. The sneakers are highly anticipated.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge camera specs leaked ahead of April launch- All details
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 series at its Galaxy Unpacked event. The company also teased a new slim model called the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge during the event. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge was glimpsed during the Galaxy Unpacked event.

articles.title: From drips to drops: Evolution of smartphone damage
articles.author: State Point Media
articles.summary: Allstate Protection Plans' Breakability Tests reveal evolving risks to smartphones. Modern smartphones like the Apple iPhone and Samsung Galaxy utilize advancements like IP68 ratings. Despite improvements, the Samsung S24 Ultra and iPhone 16 sustained damage in drop tests.
